Package info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoAllTasksRule
    A DoAllTasksRule defines a task rule by which all mentioned tasks have to be fulfilled.
    DoAnyTaskRule
    A DoAnyTaskRule defines a task rule by which only one of all mentioned tasks have to be fulfilled.
    FinishedGoal
    When a player has completed a Goal, it will be added to the playerâ€™s list of finished goals.
    GetPointsRule
    A PointsRule is a sub-class of the GoalRule.
    Goal
    A Goal comprises one or more tasks and is associated with a goal rule.
    GoalRule
    With a Goalrule can be defined which tasks and if all or only one task have to be fulfilled to reach a goal and obtain the rewards for it.
    TaskRule
    A TaskRule defines the combination of tasks until a goal is fulfilled.
